name: Pool Billiard Trainer LT
description:
This game is a good pool physics trainer for all ages. It is very funny to play and easy to learn. There are five different games and the goal is to put all the balls in the holes.

Features:

-Realistic pool billiard simulation
-Hours of funny gameplay
-Ideal for all child's
-5 different games
-5 different tables
-Realistic sounds

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
